title: 356. America’s Hidden Duopoly
description: We all know our political system is “broken” — but what if that’s not true? Some say the Republicans and Democrats constitute a wildly successful industry that has colluded to kill off competition, stifle reform, and drive the country apart. So what are you going to do about it?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
